content.rendered:
Watch this webinar to learn more about recently released and upcoming updates!

Followup Resources

  • Virtual Fair Launch Kit: Resources to help you plan your virtual fair, including a brand new Career Services Checklist and Employer Playbook.
  • 2020 Campus to Career Report: An overview of the virtual recruiting trends we saw across students, employers, and higher ed in 2020.
  • Virtual Fair Benchmark Report: A rollup of a semester’s worth of valuable virtual fair insights on student and employer engagement, plus key considerations for virtual fair planning. 
  • Handshake Blog: Your go-to hub for new events, reports, case studies and more, with dedicated resources for students and employers as well.

Have additional questions? Reach out to your Relationship Manager or our Support Team via our Help Center.

View all career center webinars

excerpt.rendered: Learn more about recently released and upcoming updates
